overview:
Tech Evangelist

A programmer, well known writer and owner of the famous Salesforce Labs blog. Harshit is known for the his contribution in cloud computing domain, specially Salesforce.com and Ruby on Rails

Harshit has done masters in computer science from Texas State University and have jointly and individually written numerous articles and notes on the wide ranges in computer science and own three blogs

Harshit address his articles through Forcelabs covering ((Salesforce, CloudFoundary, Git, Ruby on Rails) , he was recognized by CloudSpokes (world wide cloud computing challange), Appirio, Facebook for his contribution of articles, solution.

In addition, Harshit is actively involved in Salesforce forum helping and resolving complex issue on Developer Forum, found with the username forcelabs

Forcelabs is growing popularity in social domain and can also be reached on Facebook and Google Plus community as well

Harshit’s personal blog was a big hit for a long time with on average 5500 hits per day, started with Title ‘Visions of Life’ now renamed as ‘Tech Spice’

Find Harshit Linkedin and his blogs/website links below

Linkedin - http://www.linkedin.com/in/pandeyharshit Google Plus Community - https://plus.google.com/106814948363460612830

Harshit Pandey’s Personal Blog - http://harshitpandey.wordpress.com
